# Loading Spatial data

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE, eval=T, fig.height=4, fig.width=6}

setwd("/data/10x_data/10x_visium/")
source("00.import.R")

hip142079 <- readRDS("./output/hip142079.rds")

```

# Add Nanopore data: ISO, ISOG, JUNC and AtoI assays, scale_my_data

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE, eval=T, fig.height=6, fig.width=8}

all = read.delim("./nanopore/hip142079_genematrix.txt", stringsAsFactors = F)
data = all[,2:ncol(all)]
colnames(data) <- paste(colnames(data),"-1", sep="")
rownames(data) <- all$geneId
vect <- colnames(hip142079@assays$Spatial)
data <- data[vect]
hip142079[["ISOG"]] <- CreateAssayObject(counts = data)
hip142079 <- NormalizeData(object = hip142079, assay = "ISOG")
hip142079 <- ScaleData(object = hip142079, assay = "ISOG")

all = read.delim("./nanopore/hip142079_isomatrix.txt", stringsAsFactors = F)
data = all[,4:ncol(all)]
dim(data)
colnames(data) <- paste(colnames(data),"-1", sep="")
rownames(data) = paste(all$geneId, all$transcriptId, sep="..")
vect <- colnames(hip142079@assays$Spatial)
idx <- grep("undef", rownames(data), invert = TRUE)
data <- data[idx,vect]
dim(data)
hip142079[["ISO"]] <- CreateAssayObject(counts = data)
hip142079 <- NormalizeData(object = hip142079, assay = "ISO")
hip142079 <- scale_my_data(hip142079, assay="ISO")

all = read.delim("./nanopore/hip142079_juncmatrix.txt", stringsAsFactors = F)
data = all[,2:ncol(all)]
dim(data)
colnames(data) <- paste(colnames(data),"-1", sep="")
rownames(data) = str_replace(all$junctionId, ":", "..")
vect <- colnames(hip142079@assays$Spatial)
data <- data[,vect]
data <- data[which(Matrix::rowSums(data)>9),]
dim(data)
hip142079[["JUNC"]] <- CreateAssayObject(counts = data)
hip142079 <- NormalizeData(object = hip142079, assay = "JUNC")
hip142079 <- scale_my_data(hip142079, assay="JUNC")

all = read.delim("./nanopore/hip142079.snp100838.RN3.QV6_snpmatrix.csv", sep=",", stringsAsFactors = F)
data = all[,4:ncol(all)]
dim(data)
colnames(data) <- paste(colnames(data),"-1", sep="")
rownames(data) = paste(all$geneId, all$transcriptId, sep=":")
vect <- colnames(hip142079@assays$Spatial)
#idx <- grep("intergenic", rownames(data), invert = TRUE)
#data <- data[idx,vect]
#idx <- grep("Rik", rownames(data), invert = TRUE)
data <- data[,vect]
idx1 <- grep("\\.\\.A", rownames(data))
idx2 <- grep("\\.\\.G", rownames(data))
data <- data[c(idx1,idx2),]
dim(data)

x <- unique(sapply(strsplit(rownames(data), "\\.\\."), `[`, 1))
countA <- data[grep("\\.\\.A",rownames(data)),]
colnames(countA) <- colnames(data)
rownames(countA) <- x
countG <- data[grep("\\.\\.G",rownames(data)),]
colnames(countG) <- colnames(data)
rownames(countG) <- x
ratio <- countG/(countA+countG)

#countA[is.na(countA)] <- 0
#countG[is.na(countG)] <- 0

hip142079[['AtoI_A']] <- Matrix::colSums(countA)
hip142079[['AtoI_G']] <- Matrix::colSums(countG)
hip142079[['AtoI_total']] <- hip142079[['AtoI_A']]+hip142079[['AtoI_G']]
hip142079[['AtoI_ratio']] <- hip142079[['AtoI_G']]/hip142079[['AtoI_total']]
hip142079[['AtoI_detected']] <- Matrix::colSums(countG > 0)

hip142079[["AtoI"]] <- CreateAssayObject(counts = countA)
hip142079 <- SetAssayData(hip142079, slot = "data", as.matrix(countG), assay = "AtoI")
hip142079 <- SetAssayData(hip142079, slot = "scale.data", as.matrix(ratio), assay = "AtoI")

saveRDS(hip142079, "./output/hip142079.nanopore.rds")


```
